modName: Vampire Cuirass for TBBP lovers - DreamGirl UNPB CBBE and 7BASE body
summary: Vampire Cuirass made by newmiller with added TBBP support. Supports DreamGirl, UNPB, CBBE and 7BASE bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img163/5796/0w7z.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img38/205/deu0.png[/img][/center]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img191/18/64d7.png[/img]

-Original release


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img546/9506/hpkc.png[/img]


PLEASE READ THROUGH THIS PAGE BEFORE POSTING ANY QUESTIONS!

This mod adds TBBP support to the original Vampire Cuirass armor made by newmiller. You can download the original one [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46696/]here[/url].
For BODYSLIDE version, the files inside BODYSLIDE made by ousnius already comes with TBBP. Download it in original author's page above.
For 7BASE version please download the UNPB version then replace with my 7BASE files.


Please check out my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48648/]Black Rose - CBBE TBBP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49350/]Latex Corset - CBBE TBBP with BODYSLIDE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50301/]Sexy Transparent Zipsuit - 7BASE UNPB CBBE BODYSLIDE with optional TBBP support[/url]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img837/8295/i4xu.png[/img]


[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46696/]Vampire cuirass with chains for DreamGirl UNPB BBP and CBBE body by newmiller[/url]
and
[*]Any TBBP supported skeleton or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
[/list]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img59/3353/b1on.png[/img]
Q: Your armor sucks!
A: Thanks for checking it out and bye. Go do something else more productive than to complain in the posts.

Q: My game crashed when I tried to equip the armor!
A: If you already have a TBBP compatible skeleton, then Reinstall your skeleton. Some mods like to include their own skeleton and may replace your TBBP-supported skeleton. Also make sure even your custom races have TBBP supported skeleton as well. MAKE SURE your 1st person skeleton is also TBBP supported!

Q: What hair is that?
A: SG Hairpack. You will have to search for it yourself.

Q: How did you make the face of your character?
A: A lot of creativity and imagination using ECE (Enhanced Character Edit) which you can find here on the nexus.

Q: Will you make your character into a follower?
A: Sorry, no plans so far. Too busy imagining new armors and making them into reality (in game at least).


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img829/6170/c4qi.png[/img]


[LIST]
[*]Download Vampire cuirass with chains for DreamGirl UNPB BBP and CBBE body by newmiller
[*]Download my files
[*]Install with NMM or simply drag and drop the files into their respective folders. Overwrite if necessary. (Always make a backup if you overwrite)
[/LIST]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img690/8016/nkup.png[/img]


Feel free to redistribute, modify the mesh and fix bugs if necessary but always credit myself and the original author.


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img849/8964/qp5c.png[/img]
